title: AGI-KERNEL Axiomatic Change Validation Report Schema
description: Defines the immutable structure for the outcome audit log of an Axiomatic Change Validation run, capturing context related to autonomous evolution and kernel state.

change_id.description: Unique identifier for the code change or evolution cycle.

kernel_context.description: Contextual data about the kernel state during validation.

source_process.description: Originating source of the validated change.

validation_status.description: Overall outcome of the validation process.

impact_assessment.description: Assessment of the change's impact on core AGI capabilities, measured as deltas.

results.description: Detailed result of each axiom check.

details.description: Detailed reason for failure, override justification, or specific warnings.

triggered_failure_mode.description: The automated or required action resulting from a failure, including explicit governance for emergent paths.

target_file.description: The file path targeted by this specific axiom check.
